comment_body.0:
• Location: Ontario, Canada

• Price range: 0-35000 CAD Would be looking at leasing for no more than 400/450 a month

• Lease or Buy: Either

• New or used: Either, but at this price range probably used

• Type of vehicle: Sports sedan/hatch/coupe

• Must haves: Somewhat Fuel efficient, decent trunk space for a couple sets of golf clubs, android auto, decent reliability, smaller than a large sedan, heated seats. Awd is a bonus but not required.

• Desired transmission (auto/manual, etc): Either is fine. Would prefer auto, but manual works too

• Intended use: Daily driver/fun car

• Vehicles you've already considered: wrx, civic Si, focus st

• Is this your 1st vehicle: No

• Do you need a Warranty: No, but would be a bonus

• Can you do Minor work on your own vehicle: Only very minor work like fuses, tires, batteries etc

• Can you do Major work on your own vehicle: No

• Additional Notes: Looking for something practical but fun. Willing to sacrifice some practicality for a little power/entertainment. Willing to push the budget to get both if possible. Subdued styling is more my taste ie the type r is a little much imo
